name: Hand Cricket
description:
Hand Cricket is a fun strategy based cricket game with numbers on it gives a real cricketing experience . The seat edge cricketing experience will be there for sure

A different attempt of idea to depict an outdoor sport with numbers and came out well .  It is a solo developed indie game .

Follow our profile for other interesting games also check our previous games
